title: PMS 2.0 555 - MASSIVE ANNOUNCEMENT THURSDAY, Thursday Night Football Preview, Steve Smith Sr., Ian Rapoport, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat finally addresses the big news that he's been teasing for a few months now, before diving into tonight's Thursday Night Football game and AJ Hawk's super boost of the Pittsburgh Steelers ML over the Minnesota Vikings available only at FanDuel Sportsbook. Joining the program to chat about everything about tonight's game and what to expect from week 14 from the NFL season is NFL Network Insider, friend of the program, Ian Rapoport (18:00-39:24). Later, joining Pat and AJ Hawk to chat about tonight's game, his career, at what point he turned the switch off, being one of the fiercest competitors in the history of the NFL, 5x Pro Bowler, 3x All-Pro, member of the Carolina Panthers Hall of Fame and now panelist for Thursday Night Football games, the legend Steve Smith Sr. (41:27-1:12:22). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
